About Us

Technology has ushered human civilization with oodles of goodness. It has opened the door of wide opportunities, letting them explore on their terms to build something more creative and new. In the world of cutthroat competition, people are chasing after technological hacks to offer distinguished services to the users who count on them.

In that respect, we as a prudent team came into limelight with newly designed strategies and assurance, which will give you a chance to get in touch with a robust mobile app development company – MediaShopCanada.

We allow clients to foster their business by relying on us. To date, we made a distinguished name in the industry with our accomplished user’s retention list. We stand by our ethics and work on principle, which makes us drive the wheel of success with excellence.

We are diligent thinkers and activists who invariably assist the clients to make their dream business amplify in every respect. Honestly, our true potential and dedication are the credentials that make us the merited mobile app and web development company.

Our top-class services are compartmentalized to serve any domain with expertise. Elaborating on our service, clients from start-ups to enterprises can always put faith in our deeds and words. We have a conviction of taking a pragmatic approach while dealing with any entrepreneur. We work in a methodical way right from hearing to their need to executing the same with precision, that makes us ace the field with command.

Our trademark lies in our timely service. On top of that, we have furnished our core competency in major app development genres like the iPhone, Android, and web design and development. Our comprehensive list of services in these domains is meant to tick all the right boxes of your requirements.

Overall, we offer customization on each of our app development services to ensure competitive edge to and targeted growth in our client businesses.

Engagement Models

Every business has a distinct demand and we meet these by offering multiple engagement models.

Fixed Budget

We follow strict and high quality standards throughout the duration of the period
1. Pricing based on requirement
2.Pay for quality not quantity
3.No hidden cost
4. Highest working standards

Cloud Team

This is the most flexible method as you have a dedicated team and you will be able to make real time changes.

1. Real-time Updates
2. Personalized Team
3.Cost Effective

Time & Material

As there is no fixed time & budget, you pay only for the hours taken by us to accomplish the assignment.

1. Discuss and understand
2. Value for your time
3. Get Regular Updates
